According to the live text, please count the number of: 1.goals, 2. shots, 3.fouls, 4.yellow cards, 5.red cards, 6.corner kicks, 7.free kicks, and 8.offsides for each team. Note that goals and saved attempts and blocked attempts and missed attempts are considered shots. Handball and dangerous play are also considered foul. The second yellow card is also considered a red card.
Penalty is also considered as free kicks.

Output Format and Instructions:
1. Keep the Home Team and Away Team as row headers in the table.
2. The first row of the table should contain the headers.
3. Use "|" as a separator between cells.
4. Use "<NEWLINE>" literal at the end of every row.
5. Return the final table with the heading ### Final Table

Here is a sample output format:

### Final Table:
| Team | Goals | Red Cards | Fouls | Yellow Cards | Shots | Free Kicks | Corner Kicks | Offsides | <NEWLINE>
| Home Team | 0 | 0 | 13 | 4 | 11 | 9 | 6 | 1 | <NEWLINE>
| Away Team | 3 | 0 | 9 | 1 | 11 | 13 | 8 | 7 | <NEWLINE>

Here is an example of the input and the expected output:

Input:
The game is starting with the first half. Player4(Home Team) commits a foul leading to Player29(Away Team) winning a free kick in the attacking half, This results in a free kick for Player29(Away Team) in the attacking half. Player10(Home Team)'s left footed shot from the right side of the box was saved in the bottom right corner with an assist from Player9(Home Team). The Away Team earns a corner kick. Player8(Home Team) earns a free kick in their own half. Player22(Away Team) commits a foul. Player26(Away Team) commits a foul on Player11(Home Team), who wins a free kick in the attacking half, This results in a set piece opportunity for the attacking team. Player2(Home Team) commits a foul. Player29(Away Team) earns a free kick in their own half. Player8(Home Team) commits a foul. Player28(Away Team) earns a free kick on the right side of the field. Player10(Home Team) commits a foul, resulting in Player23(Away Team) winning a free kick in their defensive half. Player10(Home Team) commits a foul. Player24(Away Team) earns a free kick in their own half. Player9(Home Team)'s header from the center of the box was close but missed to the right, assisted by Player7(Home Team) with a cross. Player10(Home Team) commits a foul. Player28(Away Team) wins a free kick in the defensive half, Player26(Away Team)'s shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner with an assist from Player21(Away Team). Player7(Home Team) earns a free kick on the right side of the field. Player22(Away Team) commits a foul. Player7(Home Team) earns a free kick on the right side of the field. Player21(Away Team) commits a foul. Player8(Home Team)'s shot from outside the box is blocked with Player11(Home Team)'s assistance. Player25(Away Team) takes a shot with his right foot from outside the box, but it hits the crossbar, Player28(Away Team) provided the assist. Player7(Home Team) is currently being delayed in the match due to an injury. The delay has ended and they are prepared to resume play. Player8(Home Team)'s shot from outside the box is blocked with Player10(Home Team)'s assistance. Player11(Home Team)'s shot from the left side of the box is blocked after being assisted by Player2(Home Team) with a cross. Player5(Home Team)'s header from the center of the box, assisted by Player10(Home Team) with a cross, is saved in the bottom right corner after the Home Team obtains a corner kick. Player24(Away Team) commits a foul on Player9(Home Team), who earns a free kick in their defensive half. Player4(Home Team) earns a free kick in their own half. Player29(Away Team) and Player7(Home Team) both commit fouls. Player21(Away Team) earns a free kick in their own half. Player28(Away Team) misses the target with a high right-footed shot from the center of the box, after receiving a cross from Player25(Away Team). Player8(Home Team) commits a foul. Player21(Away Team) earns a free kick in the opponent's half. Player25(Away Team) narrowly misses hitting the left post with a right-footed shot from outside the box on a direct free kick, while Player27(Away Team)'s header from the center of the box, assisted by Player20(Away Team) with a cross, also misses to the right. At the end of the first half, the score is tied at 0-0 between the Home Team and the Away Team. The second half is underway with the score tied at 0-0 between the Home Team and the Away Team. Player29(Away Team) handles the ball. And it's a goal! The Home Team leads 1-0 against the Away Team thanks to Player11(Home Team)'s right-footed shot from outside the box into the bottom left corner. Player2(Home Team) commits a foul. Player29(Away Team) earns a free kick on the left side of the field. Player2(Home Team) receives a yellow card for a rough tackle. The Away Team wins a corner kick. Player29(Away Team) misses a right-footed shot from outside the box to the right, assisted by Player21(Away Team), as Player9(Home Team) wins a free kick in the attacking half. Player22(Away Team) commits a foul. Player27(Away Team)'s shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal with the help of Player25(Away Team). Player9(Home Team)'s left-footed shot from outside the box was blocked after receiving an assist from Player17(Home Team). Player10(Home Team)'s shot from outside the box with their left foot was saved in the center of the goal, assisted by Player9(Home Team). Player5(Home Team) commits a foul on Player22(Away Team), resulting in a free kick for the attacking team. Player5(Home Team) receives a yellow card for a reckless foul. Player25(Away Team)'s shot from outside the box is blocked. Player26(Away Team) fouls Player4(Home Team), resulting in a free kick in the defensive half. Player10(Home Team) attempts a through ball, but Player9(Home Team) is offside. Player11(Home Team) commits a foul. Player20(Away Team) earns a free kick on the right side of the field. Player4(Home Team) commits a foul, resulting in Player29(Away Team) winning a free kick in the attacking half. Player4(Home Team) receives a yellow card for a harsh foul. Player25(Away Team) receives a yellow card. Player25(Away Team)'s shot from the center of the box was blocked with the help of Player21(Away Team). Player28(Away Team)'s shot from the right side of the box is blocked with the help of Player26(Away Team), resulting in a corner kick awarded to the Away Team. The Away Team earns a corner kick. Player20(Away Team) has committed a hand ball. Player9(Home Team) misses the goal with a high and wide shot from outside the box, with an assist from Player11(Home Team). Player13(Home Team) commits a foul, resulting in Player21(Away Team) earning a free kick on the left wing, . Player25(Away Team) commits a foul, resulting in Player2(Home Team) winning a free kick in their defensive half. Player13(Home Team) commits a foul, resulting in Player21(Away Team) winning a free kick on the left wing, The foul was committed by Player13(Home Team), leading to Player21(Away Team) being awarded a free kick on the left wing. Player34(Away Team)'s shot from the center of the box is blocked. Player25(Away Team)'s right footed shot from the center of the box is blocked and Player32(Away Team)'s header from the same area is saved in the bottom right corner. Player13(Home Team) commits a foul. Player21(Away Team) earns a free kick on the left side of the field. Player32(Away Team)'s shot from the center of the box is blocked. Player13(Home Team) has given away a penalty in the box with a foul. Penalty for the Away Team as Player35(Away Team) is fouled in the box. Player13(Home Team) has been given a yellow card for a harsh challenge. And it's a goal! The Home Team and Away Team are now tied at 1-1 thanks to Player21(Away Team)'s penalty kick into the bottom left corner with their left foot. Offside called against the Away Team as Player34(Away Team) attempts a through ball, but Player25(Away Team) is caught offside. The Home Team wins a corner kick. The game is tied 1-1 as the second half comes to a close. The game finishes with both teams scoring one goal each.

Output: 
| Team | Goals | Red Cards | Fouls | Yellow Cards | Shots | Free Kicks | Corner Kicks | Offsides | <NEWLINE>
| Home Team | 1 | 0 | 16 | 4 | 10 | 9 | 2 | 1 | <NEWLINE>
| Away Team | 1 | 0 | 11 | 1 | 16 | 16 | 5 | 1 | <NEWLINE>


Please output a table with 2 rows in the specified CSV format according to the following live text:
